name: used nitrate salts, for solar power application to market for nitrate salts, for solar power application | nitrate salts, for solar power application | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21665/documentation

This activity links used nitrate salts, for solar power application to the market for nitrate salts, for solar power application. This activity allows to model the reuse of used nitrate salts discharged from one concentrating solar power (CSP) power plant after the end of its life in a new power plant. First generation CSP plants are considered to be fed with nitrate salts from primary production only. Reuse of salts may be relevant for the construction of second generation CSP plants in the future. The production volume of this activity represents the amount of nitrate salts expected to be liberated from first generation CSP plants.

This activity starts with input of used nitrate salts, for solar power application, liberated from concentrating solar power (CSP) plants at the end of their lifetime.

This activity ends with the provision nitrate salts, for solar power application to the market.
